- [93mParameter[0m [92mDesign[0m of [93mSand[0m [93mCasting[0m to [93mMinimize[0m [93mShrinkage[0m [93mDefects[0m, [93mPorosity[0m [93mDefects[0m and [93mIncomplete[0m [93mDefects[0m: [93mCasting[0m is [93mone[0m of the [93mmost[0m [93mcommonly[0m [93mused[0m [93mmanufacturing[0m [93mmethod[0m for [93mgeometrically[0m [93mcomplex[0m [93mproduct[0m. Among the [93mcasting[0m [93mtechnologies[0m, [93msand[0m [93mcasting[0m is [93moften[0m [93mfound[0m in [93mapplication[0m. [93mBeside[0m the [93madvantages[0m of the [93msand[0m-[93mcasting[0m [93mprocess[0m, it [93malso[0m [93mhas[0m a [93mdrawback[0m that is [93moften[0m [93mencountered[0m, [93mnamely[0m [93mproduct[0m [93mdefects[0m. [93mProduct[0m [93mdefects[0m [93mcan[0m be [93mcaused[0m by a [93mlack[0m of [93mattention[0m to [93msand[0m [93mcasting[0m [93mparameters[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93maims[0m to [93mminimize[0m those [93mdefects[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mporosity[0m [93mdefects[0m, [93mshrinkage[0m [93mdefects[0m and [93mincomplete[0m [93mdefects[0m by [93moptimizing[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mparameters[0m [93musing[0m the [93mTaguchi[0m [93mmethod[0m. The [93midentified[0m [93msand[0m-[93mcasting[0m [93mprocess[0m [93mparameters[0m [93minclude[0m [93mgating[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mriser[0m [93mlocation[0m, [93mmolding[0m [93mconditions[0m and [93mpouring[0m [93mtemperature[0m with [93meach[0m [93mparameter[0m [93mconsisting[0m of [93m3[0m [93mlevels[0m. This [93mresearch[0m [93musing[0m the [93mfractional[0m [93mfactorial[0m [93mL[0m [93m9[0m ([93m3[0m [93m4[0m ). [93mData[0m [93mprocessing[0m is [93mcarried[0m out by [93manalysis[0m of [93mmean[0m ([93mANOM[0m) to [93mobtain[0m [93mplot[0m [93meffects[0m. The [93mresults[0m [93mshowed[0m that the [93moptimal[0m [93mcombination[0m of [93mparameters[0m that [93mresulted[0m in [93mshrinkage[0m, [93mporosity[0m and [93mminimal[0m [93mincomplete[0m [93mdefects[0m were at [93mgating[0m [93mlocation[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m2[0m, [93mriser[0m [93mlocation[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m1[0m, [93mmold[0m [93mcondition[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m2[0m and [93mpouring[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mlevel[0m [93m3[0m. The [93mresults[0m of the [93mcomparison[0m before and after [93moptimization[0m were an [93mincrease[0m of [93m0[0m.[93m77[0m, where [93mpreviously[0m it was [93m1[0m.[93m30[0m to [93m2[0m.[93m07[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mnormalized[0m [93mdata[0m.
- An [93meye[0m for [93mdefects[0m
- [93mStatistical[0m [93mThermodynamics[0m of [93mPoint[0m [93mDefects[0m and [93mInteractions[0m between [93mDefects[0m in [93mCeramics[0m
- [93mSensor[0m [93mfilm[0m [93mminimizes[0m [93mdefects[0m
- [93mRecommendations[0m from the WHO [93mguideline[0m for the [93mprevention[0m, [95mdiagnosis[0m, and [93mtreatment[0m of [93minfertility[0m†.: [93mStudy[0m [93mquestion[0m: What is the [93mrecommended[0m [93mprevention[0m, [95mdiagnosis[0m, and [93mtreatment[0m of [93minfertility[0m among [93mindividuals[0m and [93mcouples[0m? [93mSummary[0m [93manswer[0m: The [93mWorld[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mOrganization[0m (WHO) [93mmade[0m [93m40[0m [93mrecommendations[0m and [93msix[0m [93mgood[0m [93mpractice[0m [93mstatements[0m for the [93mprevention[0m, [95mdiagnosis[0m, and [93mtreatment[0m of [93minfertility[0m. What is [93mknown[0m [93malready[0m: The [93mfield[0m of [93msexual[0m and [93mreproductive[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mcare[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mfamily[0m [93mplanning[0m [93mhas[0m [93mprogressed[0m in the [93mlast[0m [93mseveral[0m [93mdecades[0m. [93mSignificant[0m [93mprogress[0m [93mhas[0m [93malso[0m been [93mmade[0m in the [93mfield[0m of [93mmedically[0m [93massisted[0m [93mreproduction[0m. [93mGlobally[0m, [93mone[0m in [93msix[0m [93mpeople[0m [93mexperience[0m [93minfertility[0m in [93mtheir[0m [93mlifetime[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mmany[0m [93mcountries[0m [93mdo[0m not [93minclude[0m the [93mprevention[0m, [95mdiagnosis[0m, and [93mtreatment[0m of [93minfertility[0m in [93mhealth[0m [93mpolicies[0m, [93mfinancing[0m, and [93mservices[0m, and [93mmany[0m [93mdo[0m not [93mhave[0m [93mnational[0m [93mclinical[0m [93mguidelines[0m for the [93mprevention[0m, [95mdiagnosis[0m, and [93mtreatment[0m of [93minfertility[0m. [93mStudy[0m [92mdesign[0m, [93msize[0m, [93mduration[0m: The [93mguideline[0m was [93mdeveloped[0m [93maccording[0m to the WHO [93mhandbook[0m for [93mguideline[0m [93mdevelopment[0m. A [93mGuideline[0m [93mDevelopment[0m [93mGroup[0m ([93mGDG[0m) was [93massembled[0m and [93mincluded[0m a [93mmultidisciplinary[0m and [93mregionally[0m [93mdiverse[0m [93mset[0m of [93mclinicians[0m, [93mpolicymakers[0m, [93mresearchers[0m, [93mimplementers[0m, and [93mrepresentatives[0m of [93mpatient[0m [93mgroups[0m ([93mn[0m=[93m30[0m). The [93mGDG[0m [93mprioritized[0m [93mkey[0m [93mrecommendation[0m [93mquestions[0m to [93maddress[0m in the [93mguideline[0m. [93mParticipants[0m/[93mmaterials[0m, [93msetting[0m, [93mmethods[0m: [93mNew[0m [93msystematic[0m [93mreviews[0m were [93mconducted[0m, or [93mexisting[0m [93mreviews[0m [93mupdated[0m, to [93minform[0m the [93mrecommendations[0m. The [93mGRADE[0m [93mapproach[0m was [93mused[0m to [93massess[0m the [93mcertainty[0m of the [93mevidence[0m and to [93mguide[0m the [93mformulation[0m of [93mrecommendations[0m. The [93mGDG[0m [93minterpreted[0m [93mevidence[0m and [93mmade[0m [93mjudgments[0m about the [93mbalance[0m between [93mbenefits[0m and [93mharms[0m ([93mincluding[0m [93mpatients[0m' [93mvalues[0m) as [93mwell[0m as [93mcosts[0m, [93mfeasibility[0m, [93macceptability[0m, and [93mequity[0m. The [93mrecommendations[0m were [93mdrafted[0m, [93mreviewed[0m by an [93mExternal[0m [93mReview[0m [93mGroup[0m ([93mERG[0m) [93mcomprising[0m [93m30[0m [93mmembers[0m, and [93mapproved[0m by the WHO. [93mMain[0m [93mresults[0m and the [93mrole[0m of [93mchance[0m: The [93mguideline[0m [93mmakes[0m [93mgood[0m [93mpractice[0m [93mstatements[0m [93mrelated[0m to the [93mgeneral[0m [33mmanagement[0m of [93minfertility[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m6[0m) [93mincluding[0m ([93mi[0m) [93mselection[0m of [93mtests[0m, ([93mii[0m) [93mlistening[0m to [93mindividuals[0m and [93mcouples[0m with [93minfertility[0m, ([93miii[0m) [93mchoosing[0m [93mtreatment[0m [93mdecisions[0m, ([93miv[0m) [93mclinical[0m [93mfollow[0m-up, and ([93mv[0m) [93mdocumenting[0m [93moutcomes[0m of [93mtreatment[0m. In [93mrelation[0m to [93mprevention[0m, it [93mprovides[0m [93mrecommendations[0m [93mrelated[0m to the [93mprovision[0m of [93minformation[0m about [93mfertility[0m and [93minfertility[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m1[0m) and [93mreduction[0m of [93minfertility[0m [93mrisk[0m from [93msexually[0m [93mtransmitted[0m [93minfections[0m ([93mSTIs[0m; [93mn[0m = [93m1[0m), [93mlifestyle[0m [93mfactors[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m1[0m), and [93mtobacco[0m [93muse[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m1[0m). In [93mterms[0m of [95mdiagnosis[0m, [93mrecommendations[0m for [93mdiagnosing[0m [93minfertility[0m [93mcaused[0m by [93movulatory[0m [93mdysfunction[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m3[0m), [93mtubal[0m [93mdisease[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m1[0m), or [93muterine[0m [93mcavity[0m [93mabnormalities[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m5[0m) among [93mfemales[0m are [93mprovided[0m. For [93mmales[0m, the [93mguideline[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mrecommendations[0m [93mregarding[0m when a [93msemen[0m [93mtest[0m [93mshould[0m be [93mrepeated[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m2[0m). [93mAlso[0m [93mincluded[0m is a [93mrecommendation[0m for [93mdiagnosing[0m [93munexplained[0m [93minfertility[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m1[0m). [93mRegarding[0m [93mtreatment[0m, the [93mguideline[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mrecommendations[0m [93mrelated[0m to the [93mtreatment[0m of [93mpolycystic[0m [93movary[0m [93msyndrome[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m6[0m), [93mtubal[0m [93mdisease[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m5[0m), [93muterine[0m [93mseptae[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m1[0m), [93mvaricocele[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m4[0m), and [93munexplained[0m [93minfertility[0m ([93mn[0m = [93m6[0m). [93mBased[0m on [93mavailable[0m [93mevidence[0m, the [93mGDG[0m [93mdid[0m not [93mmake[0m a [93mrecommendation[0m for or [93magainst[0m the [93muse[0m of [93mantioxidant[0m [93msupplements[0m in [93mmales[0m. [93mMost[0m [93mrecommendations[0m were [93mconditional[0m because [93mrelevant[0m [93mevidence[0m was [93meither[0m [93mabsent[0m, or of [93mlow[0m or [93mvery[0m [93mlow[0m [93mcertainty[0m. [93mCritical[0m [93mresearch[0m [93mgaps[0m were [93midentified[0m. [93mLimitations[0m, [93mreasons[0m for [93mcaution[0m: The [93mrecommendations[0m [93mdo[0m not [93mcover[0m [93mall[0m [93maspects[0m of [93minfertility[0m and [93mfertility[0m [93mcare[0m, but [93msubsequent[0m [93meditions[0m of the [93mguideline[0m [93mwill[0m [93mexpand[0m the [93mscope[0m of [93mrecommendations[0m. [93mWider[0m [93mimplications[0m of the [93mfindings[0m: By [93mcentring[0m [93mequity[0m, [93mscience[0m, and the [93mimperative[0m to [93mprovide[0m [93mfertility[0m [93mcare[0m as [93mpart[0m of [93muniversal[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mcoverage[0m, the [93mguideline[0m [93maims[0m to [93msupport[0m [93mcountries[0m in [93mdelivering[0m [93mhigh[0m-[93mquality[0m, [93mequitable[0m, and [93meffective[0m [93mhealthcare[0m for [93mall[0m. [93mAlthough[0m the [93mguideline[0m is [93mprimarily[0m [93mintended[0m for [93muse[0m by [93mhealth[0m [93mcare[0m [93mprofessionals[0m, it is an [93mimportant[0m [94msource[0m for [93mpolicymakers[0m to [93minform[0m [93mnational[0m [93mguidelines[0m and to [93minform[0m the [93mwork[0m of [93mprofessional[0m [93mpatient[0m [93msupport[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93madvocacy[0m [93morganizations[0m, [93mfunding[0m and [93mphilanthropic[0m [93magencies[0m, [93mcivil[0m [93msociety[0m, [93mprofessional[0m [93msocieties[0m, and [93mother[0m [93mnongovernmental[0m [93morganizations[0m that [93mprovide[0m [93msocial[0m, [93mfinancial[0m, and [93mtechnical[0m [93msupport[0m to [93mreproductive[0m [93mhealth[0m [93mprogrammes[0m. [93mStudy[0m [93mfunding[0m/[93mcompeting[0m [93minterest[0m([93ms[0m): This [93mwork[0m [93mreceived[0m [93mfunding[0m from the [93mUNDP[0m-[93mUNFPA[0m-[93mUNICEF[0m-WHO-[93mWorld[0m [93mBank[0m [93mSpecial[0m [93mProgramme[0m of [93mResearch[0m, [93mDevelopment[0m and [93mResearch[0m [93mTraining[0m in [93mHuman[0m [93mReproduction[0m ([93mHRP[0m), a [93mcosponsored[0m [93mprogramme[0m [93mexecuted[0m by the [93mWorld[0m [93mHealth[0m [93mOrganization[0m (WHO). [93mFull[0m [93mdetails[0m of [93mdeclared[0m [93minterests[0m of [93mall[0m [93mnamed[0m [93mauthors[0m are [93mshown[0m in [93mSupplementary[0m [93mTable[0m [93mS1[0m, those for [93mmembers[0m of the [93mGDG[0m who are not [93mnamed[0m [93mauthors[0m are [93mshown[0m in [93mSupplementary[0m [93mTable[0m [93mS2[0m and those for [93mmembers[0m of the [93mERG[0m are [93mshown[0m in [93mSupplementary[0m [93mTable[0m [93mS3[0m. [93mTrial[0m [93mregistration[0m [93mnumber[0m: [93mN[0m/A. [93mDisclaimer[0m: This [93mmanuscript[0m [93mreports[0m a [93msummary[0m of [93mrecommendations[0m from a WHO [93mguideline[0m. [93mAll[0m [93mreasonable[0m [93mprecautions[0m [93mhave[0m been [93mtaken[0m by WHO to [95mverify[0m the [93minformation[0m [93mcontained[0m in the [93mguideline[0m [93mpublication[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mpublished[0m [93mmaterial[0m is being [93mdistributed[0m without [93mwarranty[0m of [93many[0m [93mkind[0m, [93meither[0m [93mexpressed[0m or [93mimplied[0m.
- [93mLong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mfollow[0m-up of [93msurgery[0m of an [93misolated[0m [93mapical[0m [93mdefect[0m [93musing[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mmaterials[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93meffect[0m on [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m and [93msatisfaction[0m with [93mlife[0m.: [93mObjectives[0m: [93mPelvic[0m [93morgan[0m [93mprolapse[0m is an [93mextremely[0m [93mimportant[0m [93mtherapeutic[0m [93mproblem[0m and [93maffects[0m up to [93m50[0m% of [93mnulliparous[0m [93mwomen[0m. Its [93mfrequency[0m [93mincreases[0m with [93mage[0m [93mparity[0m, and it is [93mmore[0m [93mcommon[0m after [93mmenopause[0m. This [93mailment[0m [93mhas[0m a [93mnegative[0m [93mimpact[0m on [93mmany[0m [93maspects[0m of [93mlife[0m, [93msignificantly[0m [93mreducing[0m its [93mquality[0m. [93mNowadays[0m, not only the [93mcure[0m of the [93mproblem[0m, but [93malso[0m the [93mimprovement[0m of the [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m and [93mlife[0m [93msatisfaction[0m of [93mpatients[0m is of [93mgreat[0m [93mimportance[0m for [93mdoctors[0m, [93mtherefore[0m the [93massessment[0m of these [93maspects[0m [93mshould[0m [93malso[0m be [93mconstantly[0m [93mevaluated[0m. The [93mobjective[0m of this [93mstudy[0m was to [93mdetermine[0m the [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m and [93msatisfaction[0m with [93mlife[0m of [93mpatients[0m before, [93m1[0m [93myear[0m and [93m3[0m [93myears[0m after [93mperforming[0m the [93msurgery[0m of an [93misolated[0m [93mapical[0m [93mdefect[0m [93musing[0m [93mBSC[0m [93msynthetic[0m [93mmesh[0m. [93mMaterial[0m and [93mmethods[0m: Of [93m60[0m [93mpatients[0m with an [93misolated[0m [93mapical[0m [93mdefect[0m, [93m45[0m [93mhad[0m [93msufficient[0m [93mmedical[0m [93mrecords[0m for the [93manalysis[0m. [93mEvaluation[0m [93mcomprised[0m the [93mperceived[0m [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m ([93mP[0m-[93mQOL[0m) and the [93mSWLS[0m [93mquestionnaires[0m [93mconducted[0m [93mthree[0m [93mtimes[0m. [93mResults[0m: The [93mresults[0m [93mobtained[0m for the [93mP[0m-[93mQOL[0m [93mquestionnaire[0m [93mcarried[0m out after [93m3[0m [93myears[0m [93mshow[0m that the [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m of the [93mpatients[0m [93mimproved[0m. A [93mstatistically[0m [93msignificant[0m [93mincrease[0m in the [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m was [93machieved[0m in [93malmost[0m [93mall[0m [93mdomains[0m ([93mp[0m < [93m0[0m.[93m05[0m). [93mConclusions[0m: The [93mresults[0m [93mobtained[0m after [93mcompleting[0m the [93msatisfaction[0m with [93mlife[0m [93mscale[0m ([93mSWLS[0m) [93mquestionnaire[0m [93mindicate[0m that [93m3[0m [93myears[0m after the [93msurgery[0m, [93mpatients[0m' [93msatisfaction[0m with [93mlife[0m [93mshowed[0m an [93mupward[0m [93mtrend[0m. [93mSurgical[0m [93mtreatment[0m of an [93misolated[0m [93mapical[0m [93mdefect[0m [93musing[0m the [93mbilateral[0m [93msacrospinous[0m [93mcolposuspension[0m [93mkit[0m ([93mAMI[0m [93mBSC[0m) [93mresults[0m in an [93mimprovement[0m in the [93mquality[0m of [93mlife[0m in [93mmost[0m [93mpatients[0m, even in a [93mlong[0m-[93mterm[0m [93mevaluation[0m.
- [93mHigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m [93mcharge[0m.: [93mTopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m of [93mtwo[0m-[93mdimensional[0m ([93m2D[0m) [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93minsulators[0m ([93mHOTIs[0m) not only [93mserve[0m as a [93munique[0m [93msignature[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopology[0m, but [93malso[0m [93mpossess[0m [93mtremendous[0m [93mpotentials[0m in [93mprobing[0m, [93mconfining[0m, and [93mmanipulating[0m [93mparticles[0m or [93mquasiparticles[0m as [93mpossible[0m [93mcarriers[0m of [93minformation[0m and [93menergy[0m. [93mHowever[0m, [93mtopological[0m [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m are [93mnecessarily[0m [93mpinned[0m to [93mcertain[0m [93msymmetric[0m [93mpositions[0m at the [93mouter[0m [93mboundary[0m of a [93mHOTI[0m [93msample[0m, [93mimposing[0m [93mstrict[0m [93mlimitations[0m on [93mtheir[0m [93mpractical[0m [93muse[0m in [93mterms[0m of [93mnumber[0m and [93mpositioning[0m. [93mHere[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mpropose[0m a [93mtheoretical[0m [93mconcept[0m of [93mhigher[0m-[93morder[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mpoint[0m [93mstates[0m ([93mHOTPS[0m) at [93m0D[0m [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m in [93m2D[0m [93mHOTIs[0m that [93mcarry[0m a [93mfractional[0m [93mcharge[0m of [93me[0m/[93m2[0m, to [93movercome[0m the [93mlimitations[0m [93massociated[0m with [93mcorner[0m [93mstates[0m. [93mExploiting[0m this [93mnew[0m [93mconcept[0m for the [93mHOTI[0m [93mphase[0m in a [93mKekulé[0m [93mlattice[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mfurther[0m [93mexperimentally[0m [93mrealize[0m [93mHOTPS[0m in [93mboth[0m [93macoustic[0m and [93mphotonic[0m [93mmetamaterials[0m. By [93mvarying[0m the [93mspatial[0m [93mdistance[0m between a [93mpair[0m of [93mvacancies[0m, the in-[93mgap[0m [93mHOTPS[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93mcharacteristic[0m [93menergy[0m [93msplitting[0m are [93mexperimentally[0m [93mobserved[0m, [93mindicating[0m the [93mtopology[0m-[93mmodified[0m [93mlonger[0m-[93mrange[0m [93minter[0m-[93mHOTPS[0m [93minteraction[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mfindings[0m that [93minner[0m [93mvacancies[0m [93mcan[0m [93mexhibit[0m the [93msame[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mproperties[0m as [93mouter[0m [93mcorners[0m, [93mincluding[0m [93mbound[0m [93mtopological[0m [93mstates[0m and [93mquantized[0m [93mfractional[0m [93mcharges[0m, and [93mcan[0m be [93mcreated[0m [93mmore[0m [93mcontrollably[0m, [93mintroduce[0m a [93mnew[0m [93mavenue[0m in [93mHOTI[0m [93mresearch[0m and [93mset[0m the [93mstage[0m for [93mwider[0m [93mapplications[0m.

- [93mHierarchically[0m [93mPorous[0m [93mNitrogen[0m-[93mDoped[0m [93mCarbon[0m with [93mHigh[0m [93mConductivity[0m for [93mRapid[0m and [93mEfficient[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) [93mReduction[0m.: [93mCarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mmaterials[0m [93mderived[0m from [93mmetal[0m-[93morganic[0m [93mframeworks[0m [93mtypically[0m [93mexhibit[0m [93mmicroporous[0m [93mstructures[0m and [93mlow[0m [93mconductivity[0m, which [93msignificantly[0m [93mlimit[0m [93mtheir[0m [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m. [93mHerein[0m, an [93meffective[0m [93mstrategy[0m to [93mprepare[0m [93mdodecahedral[0m [93mhierarchical[0m [93mporous[0m [93mnitrogen[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mcarbon[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mcomposites[0m ([93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m) by [93musing[0m [93mZIF[0m-[93m8[0m [93mencapsulated[0m with [93mionic[0m [93mliquid[0m as [93mpyrolysis[0m [93mprecursors[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) [93mreduction[0m is [93mdeveloped[0m. The [93mencapsulated[0m [93mionic[0m [93mliquid[0m [93mhelps[0m to [93mprecisely[0m [93mregulate[0m the [93mhierarchically[0m [93mporous[0m [93mstructure[0m in [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m. This [93mhierarchically[0m [93mporous[0m [93mstructure[0m not only [93mcreates[0m a [93mfavorable[0m [93mreaction[0m [93mmicroenvironment[0m, [93mfacilitating[0m the [93mmass[0m [93mtransfer[0m of [93mCr[0m [93mspecies[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93minteraction[0m with [93mactive[0m [93msites[0m, but [93malso[0m [93menhancing[0m the [93mconductivity[0m of [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m and [93mconsequently[0m [93maccelerating[0m the [93melectron[0m [93mtransfer[0m of •[93mCO[0m [93m2[0m - [93mradicals[0m to [93mCr[0m [93mspecies[0m, [93mthereby[0m [93mspeeding[0m up the [93mreduction[0m [93mprocess[0m of [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m). [93mAdditionally[0m, with the [93mcalcination[0m [93mtemperature[0m [93mincreasing[0m, the [93mcontent[0m of [93mdefective[0m [93mC[0m [93mincreases[0m, and [93mN[0m [93mspecies[0m [93mprogressively[0m [93mtransforms[0m into [93mgraphitic[0m-[93mcenter[0m [93mN[0m ([93mN3[0m). [93mDensity[0m [93mfunctional[0m [93mtheory[0m [93mcalculations[0m [93mreveal[0m that the [93mdefective[0m [93mC[0m [93mactive[0m [93mcenter[0m [93msubstantially[0m [93mdecreases[0m the [93mfree[0m [93menergy[0m [91mchange[0m of the [93mrate[0m-[93mdetermining[0m [93mstep[0m (from [93mCr[0m([93mIV[0m) to [93mCr[0m([93mIII[0m)) through the [93msynergistic[0m [93meffect[0m of [93mN3[0m. [93mGiven[0m these [93moutstanding[0m [93mcharacteristics[0m, the [93moptimized[0m [93md[0m-[93mPNC[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mcan[0m [93mcompletely[0m [93mreduce[0m [93mCr[0m([93mVI[0m) ([93m333[0m.[93m3[0m [93mmg[0m [93mg[0m -[93m1[0m ) in an [93moxalic[0m [93macid[0m [93msolution[0m within [93m2[0m [93mmin[0m, [93moutperforming[0m its [93mcounterparts[0m without a [93mhierarchical[0m [93mstructure[0m and those [93mcalcined[0m at [93msignificantly[0m [93mlower[0m [93mtemperatures[0m.
